"Wow, this scale really does shine...":
"It's just full of some luminescent substance. Make no mistake, this will
produce some considerable body."

"Since you went to such trouble,
I'll cook this while it's still fresh!"
"I predict this will be a new, high-class dish. Thanks a lot!"

"発光物質がいっぱい詰まってるのね。
かなりのコクを出せることは

"せっかくだから、鮮度を落とさず
